snippet: An accrediting commission on Tuesday placed Florida A&M on probation for a brutal hazing ritual and issued a warning against Virginia in regards to the short-lived ouster of its president.
abstract: Accrediting commission places Florida A&M on probation for brutal hazing ritual and issues warning against Virginia in regards to short-lived ouster of its president.
lead_paragraph: An accrediting commission on Tuesday placed Florida A&M on probation for a brutal hazing ritual and issued a warning against Virginia in regards to the short-lived ouster of its president.

headline.main: Two Colleges Put on Notice By Commission Over Inquiries
headline.print_headline: Two Colleges Put on Notice By Commission Over Inquiries
